name: waterPurifyingMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the mode of the water purifier and adjust water output for specific needs.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the water purifying mode.

parameters.name: foodRecipeName
parameters.description: The name of the food recipe to be prepared using the water purifier.

parameters.name: waterAmount
parameters.description: The amount of water to be dispensed.

parameters.name: predefinedWaterAmountUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the predefined water amount.

parameters.name: predefinedWaterPurifyingMode
parameters.description: The predefined water purifying mode to be set.
